name: Main Service Panel Upgrade Rebate
description: Up to $1,500 rebate for upgrading main panel to higher amperage for EV charger or electric appliance installation; income-qualified customers may receive up to $2,500
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power provides rebates for Santa Clara residents upgrading electrical panels to support EV chargers and electric appliances.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $1,500 rebate for panel upgrade
- Up to $2,500 for income-qualified customers
- Increases panel capacity for electrification
- Supports EV charger installation
- Supports electric appliance installation
- Must be add-on to other SVP rebate
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Must apply as add-on to other SVP electrification rebate
3. Upgrade main panel to higher amperage
4. Use licensed electrician for installation
5. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
6. Submit with main rebate application
keywords: Silicon Valley Power, SVP, panel upgrade, Santa Clara, $1500, $2500, electrical panel, amperage, electrification
